articles.author: Ellen Francis
articles.title: Encouraged by Trump, Europeans plan to send troops to secure postwar Ukraine - The Washington Post
articles.description: European leaders are meeting in Paris Thursday with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and will hold a call with President Trump about U.S air defense and intelligence.
articles.content: BRUSSELS With offers from the Trump administration of airpower and intelligence, European leaders say they finally have the muscular backstop they need to send military forces into postwar Ukraine. N… [+42 chars]
